articles.description: The Ukraine international has played a key part in the Gunners' blistering start to the campaign, which has seen them sweep aside Crystal Palace, Leicester City and Bournemouth.
articles.content:
Oleksandr Zinchenko may have seemed an underwhelming summer signing, but he has brought an X-factor to Arsenal that has bamboozled their opponents this season.
